00027 class wxScriptFunctionLua : public wxScriptFunction
00028 {
00029 public:
00030 
00033         wxScriptFunctionLua(const wxString &name = wxEmptyString) { Set(name, "", NULL, 0); }
00034         virtual ~wxScriptFunctionLua() {}
00035 
00036 
00037         virtual wxScriptFunction *Clone() const {
00038                 wxScriptFunction *newf = new wxScriptFunctionLua();
00039                 newf->DeepCopy(this);
00040                 return newf;
00041         }
00042 
00043         virtual bool Exec(wxScriptVar &ret, wxScriptVar *arg) const;
00044 };

00050 class wxScriptFileLua : public wxScriptFile
00051 {
00052 public:
00053         wxScriptFileLua(const wxString &toload = wxEmptyString) { 
00054                 m_tScriptFile = wxLUA_SCRIPTFILE;
00055                 if (!toload.IsEmpty())
00056                         Load(toload);
00057         }
00058         virtual ~wxScriptFileLua() {}
00059 
00060         virtual bool Load(const wxString &filename);
00061 };
